type.description:
## Aerial Affinity

---


[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/aerial_affinity).

Allows a `PlayerEntity` to break blocks at a normal speed whilst in the air.

Type ID: `apugli:aerial_affinity`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:aerial_affinity"
}
```

title: Aerial Affinity (Power Type) date: 2022-03-05

Aerial Affinity

Power Type.

Allows a PlayerEntity to break blocks at a normal speed whilst in the air.

Type ID: apugli:aerial_affinity

Fields

None.

Example
